enb_long_title: Thirty-fifth Session of the Intergovernmental Panel on Climate Change (IPCC)
section_title: APPROVAL OF THE DRAFT REPORT OF THE 34TH SESSION
sentences: In the plenary on Wednesday, IPCC Secretary Renate Christ presented the revised draft IPCC-34 report (IPCC-XXXV/Doc.13, Rev.1), which incorporates the latest comments.
The draft report was approved without changes.
